column6: Tiger's Beautiful Daughter - her beauty is legendary; her kung fu, unmatched. Now learn how one of the most gorgeous women in the world also became one of its deadliest fighters! In a distant dimension, undefeatable men fight wars to protect their beautiful, well-groomed wives, sisters and daughters. But when the men prove not so undefeatable after all, who will stand and fight for her home...and change a world in the process? Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | colorist:David Aja | penciller:Khari Evans | inker:Victor Olazaba | letterer:Nate Piekos | writer:Duane Swierczynski
